@Zenadix wrote:

This part is wrong

if (c.getItems().addItem(id,1)) { <---- it says to give only 1 of the item, 1 coin for instance.

You must add a variable “amount” so u can specify what amount of something you want to add

item.title: When I steal a stall I don't recieve what I coded in
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

I’m useing Project Insanity Source.

break;
case 6163:
c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 10000, 1);
break;
case 6165:
c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 20000, 25);
break;
case 6166:
c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 30000, 50);
break;
case 6164:
c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 40000, 75);
break;
case 6162:
c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 50000, 90);
break;

However when I steal from it I only get 1 coin from every stall

If someone could help me thank you so much!
Regards
James
